page.title: 09STUART'S DAY a ten year old
page.content: A typical day for me is to get up at 7.00 a.m. and eat my breakfast,usually cerial,then set off for school.I call for my friend,Mark.School opens at 9.00.We have assembly,then "number" until playtime. Then it is English until lunchtime at 12.00.A typical school meal is salad and a sausage roll,followed by a cream cake.We then play outside until 1.15.p.m.We play games like "Tiggy Scarecrow" and "British Bulldog". The afternoon session might be Art and Craft or Geography, with a short break from 2.15 until 2.30. Then we finish our work and have a story until hometime at 3.30.p.m. Then I run home,get changed,have my tea and play out until it's time for bed.
